Description:
Stylish Flexible Usage - Residence or Office/Business
As new fit out, set over 2 levels in prime inner-city location.
- 3 bedrooms, built-in robe, or 2 bedrooms + study/office
- Spacious open plan living/dining
- 2 chic bathrooms
- Slick stainless steel kitchen, dishwasher
- 2 secure car spaces (right at your back door)
- Own street frontage
- Storage Cage
- Potential rental up to $500pw
- Rented $470pw / $24,444 pa till 19/6/09
Stroll to Smith St & Brunswick St shops, East Melbourne parks, Victoria Street restaurants, Trams and the CBD.
Edward Hobbs : 0411 725 263

Description:
UBER COOL TWO STOREY TWO BEDROOM INVESTMENT AT THE FRONT OF A MODERN BUILDING WITH CITY AND SMITH STREET VIEWS.
Within the easiest of walks to the city this sun drenched apartment has an undercover car park on title, a very classy entrance to the building. Two bedrooms opening to a western balcony with a great outlook, family bathroom and laundry. Upstairs to an air conditioned living space with a great kitchen and powder room plus a big western balcony. When you awake at the crack of noon all the breakfast delights of Smith Street will be available to you.
To enjoy the pleasures of ownership please call Philippe Batters 0418 992 103 or Jurgen Nicklisch 0408 338 538.
This property is securely let at $45o per week until 01/2010.
This property is proudly marketed by Williams Batters in South Yarra. If you like this advertisement and would like your property to be presented on this site please drop us a line or give us a call on 9866 4411.
Williams Batters have been here for over 130 years, if anybody knows this neighbourhood it's us!
Jurgen Nicklisch : 0408 338 538

Description:
CONTEMPORARY CITY EDGE RESIDENCE SUITED TO A RANGE OF LIFESTYLES
Designed with signature style and skill by architect Graeme Gunn, this beautifully bright free-standing contemporary home delivers distinctive large, versatile spaces including two generous living areas and dual outdoor zones, including a sensational first floor retreat for entertaining.
The downstairs open plan living/dining enjoys abundant natural light from northerly rear aspects and opens to the secluded surrounds of a lush courtyard garden featuring a calming canopy of mature trees.
Upstairs, a large second living space is accompanied by the first floor deck from which sweeping views emphasize inner city proximity to trams, cafes and a multitude of community facilities.
Two over-sized downstairs bedrooms sharing an impressively appointed bathroom are complemented upstairs by a main bedroom zoned as a retreat and enhanced by walk-in robes and fabulous second bathroom.
Off-street parking is an added asset that confirms convenience and complements total comfort throughout. Air-conditioning, ducted heating, 3m x 3m rear outbuilding and security lead an extensive list of impressive additional attractions.
Glenn Bartlett : 0418 337 710

Description:
Uncluttered, uncompromising and breathtaking
Feel the design quality with every step in this stunning two level warehouse conversion in the heart of the historical Foy & Gibson warehouse precinct.
Its vast tracts of timber and curves and masterful use of space and light reflect what is truly dynamic apartment living.
Beautifully appointed, and spacious throughout, this centrally located apartment offers three full bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe. Huge open plan entertaining zone, flows onto private paved courtyard. Upstairs to two large bedrooms, gleaming bathroom with large spa for luxurious soaks. Also featuring large store room, extra upstairs powder room and a huge retreat or additional lounge area.
Secure entry, airconditioning and undercover carparking.
Minutes to the CBD, transport and all the cafe culture and shopping of Smith and Brunswick Streets.
Paul Caine : 0407 393 588

Description:
Historic Foy & Gibson woolstore
Encompassing all the character that this historic Foy & Gibson woolstore enjoys, and all the perks of inner city living, this is truly a place to call home.
Set over two levels and surrounded by such classic warehouse features as exposed bricks and original timber trusses. Comprising huge dining area, beautifully appointed kitchen including granite benchtops, marble splash-backs and gas cooktop, large living area and downstairs powder room.
Upstairs to three bedrooms (or two plus study), ample storage and a gleaming bathroom.
Set in a boutique block, and with quality fittings throughout, you can sit back and relax as the apartment also has new 100% wool carpet, repolished floorboards and has been freshly repainted.
Other features include security entrance, air conditioning (2 units) and one carspace on the same level. Approved plans and permits for a roof-top decking are also available.
This is top quality real estate in a highly sort after location, call now to arrange an inspection.
Alana Coleman : 0447 393 012

Description:
Location, Location, Location
Located within 2km of Melbourne CBD is this 1 bedroom plus study, very impressive Islington Apartment. Comprising large entrance hall, open plan living, dining zone and a very good sized study.
Trains and trams at your doorstep. Stroll to Fitzroy gardens, MCG, and the famous Victoria, Smith and Brunswick Streets. Great for investment or owner occupancy.
Features, oversized balcony (3mx9m approx) great for entertaining and secure basement car parking
**Inspection Saturday 16th August 1.15-2.00pm**

Description:
'The Chocolate Factory' - designed around light
$550,000 plus
Taking full advantage of the inherent beauty of this rustic, commercial chocolate factory, this well located warehouse is a fine example of insightful design for light, space and a modern, well appointed layout. Flooded with natural light from the central lightwell, this 2 bedroom, (main with a walk-in robe and ensuite), 2 storey apartment has a mezzanine study, a morning balcony, a second bathroom and a swish kitchen and living room. The home has heating and cooling and a direct access garage and security door. Walking distance to fine eateries, shops, transport etc, your art house awaits. * Prime location * Brilliant design * Extremely comfortable * Recently updated Land Subdivision Terms 10% deposit, balance 30/60 days

Description:
Charm, Style & Grace
This Victorian balcony terrace, is so inviting and offering scope to update and add further value.
Perfect urban family living or exercise the current registered rooming house permit, for maximum rent return circa $100,000pa.
Showcasing 4 bedrooms all with en-suites, ground floor bedroom also doubles as an ideal artist retreat, central bathroom, kitchen/meals with dining and family living room.
The residence features high ceilings, ornate design typical of the era, open fire places, polished timber floors, hydronic heating and air-conditioning.
Combine a tranquil courtyard/garden and ROW access for handy off street parking.
Premier lifestyle location, close to popular restaurants, cafes, bars, galleries, clothing boutiques, public transport options, bike trails and parkland.
The mixed use zoning offers the flexibility of utilising the property for medical, retail, office, Airbnb or potential further development (STCA) at the rear of the property on Harrison Place.
Current Covid-19 Notice
https://www.vic.gov.au/coronavirus-covid-19-restrictions-victoria

Description:
Early 20th Century Heritage - Rare Layout Can Be Used As 2 bedroom or 1 Bed Plus Studio
One-On-One Private Inspections are available for this property at a time to best suit you and your schedule.
The Abode:
This Stunning two bedroom property boasts charismatic period charm and encapsulates a vintage element of design which is of high demand. The residence has its own separate foyer from which you can enter into the main living area to the left, or the other bedroom to the right. Each door has its own lock and key, so this would appeal to the Savvy investor, who appreciates an opportunity to effectively have a city pad available to them for free.
The Living area and sleeping quarters to left can be tenanted and the rental return from that can pay for the investment as a whole. Leaving the owner the other bedroom with its own separate bathroom, to utilize as they wish, or also tenant and supercharge the yield on their investment.
The Features:
- Two large bedrooms (fully self contained)
- Two Bathrooms
- A Sizable lounge area
- Functional and well designed Kitchen
- Views from both Bedroom
- High Ceiling and Period Windows
The Nearby:
Located in the stunning refurbished period building in one of Melbourne's CBD sought after locations. Positioned in the financial/ legal precinct of the CBD. Within walking distance of parks, shops, restaurants, high fashion, services and anything that one's heart desires.
Next Steps:
Call, reach out, email but be quick as this is in high demand. Book an appointment!
Insights: 555 other 2 bedroom unit in Melbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
Spectacular Views, Huge Terrace, Two Bedrooms Plus Study
All genuine offers considered.
Perched on the sub-penthouse level with one of the best terraces in the CBD you will delight in the incredible backdrop that will no doubt form many wonderful memories. Views to the Yarra River, Port Phillip Bay, the constantly evolving Southbank, and the famous gas brigades fire show at the Crown Precinct, it is always a spectacle and something oh-so-Melbourne that you never tire of.
The design of this building and apartment allows plenty of natural light from both the North and the South as well as good cross-flow ventilation. Beautiful wide timber floors throughout the hallway and living areas and recently repainted fresh white make for a contemporary palette to pair your favourite furnishings and artwork with. Both bedrooms have mirrored built-in robes. A central bathroom & laundry separate the bedrooms. There is also a study, perfect for those who wish to work from home.
Further benefits include secure intercom access, reverse cycle heating & cooling, a beautiful and well-maintained entrance foyer, and a full-time building manager. This apartment offers a point of difference in the CBD market and is the perfect start for those wanting the very best in lifestyle. Offered with vacant possession, come and make this your home.
Insights: 1407/555 Flinders Street, Melbourne VIC 3000 was last sold in 2018 and 555 other 2 bedroom unit in Melbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
Central City Indulgence in Ultra-Modern Luxury
A north-facing celebration of indoor/outdoor indulgence and an iconic Flinders Street address, this spacious 1 bedroom apartment in a corner setting stylishly hits the mark as a first home, upscale city base or a high-return investment option. Perfectly perched on the 11th floor of the popular Northbank Place complex, the convenient CBD location sells itself. Take a short stroll to Degraves Street cafes, Crown entertainment, South Wharf shopping, Yarra River parkland, Marvel Stadium, the Convention Centre precinct, and a wide range of public transport choice.
Enjoy crisp interiors drenched in natural northern light with generous open-plan living/dining on sleek floorboards, complemented by a well-equipped, streamlined kitchen boasting a Fisher and Paykel dishwasher. Showcasing a seamless transition to a sheltered and oversized balcony, sit back and relax overlooking Flinders Street with magical city skyline views just as spectacular day or night. Freshly painted throughout, a spacious bedroom is graced with mirrored built-in robes, serviced by a sparkling bathroom with a fully tiled walk-in shower and laundry capability.
Take advantage of ducted heating and cooling, floor-to-ceiling glass, double glazing, roller blinds, secure video intercom entry, on-site building manager, and a storage cage. Priced to sell, this one will not last long!
* Photo identification will be required upon entering the property at the inspection time.
* We are open for business remotely and here to help. Please contact our agent with your personal enquiry about this home today.
Insights: 1114/555 Flinders Street, Melbourne VIC 3000 was last sold in 2015 and 453 other 1 bedroom unit in Melbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
Enchanting Victorian with its Own Sense of Style
***Please register your interest in this property so that we can ensure you are included in the Virtual Auction and/or contacted in the event the property is going to be sold prior to the Virtual Auction 17th October at 10am***
***Please contact us via email or phone to speak about your options to privately inspect this property. Thank you.***
An exceptional city-fringe lifestyle opportunity, this freestanding period prize is sure to make an indelible impression with its timeless character, immediate quality and premier position in a blissfully quiet yet enviably convenient Richmond neighbourhood. Beyond the picket-fenced garden and gorgeous facade, discover a previously-expanded interior showcasing two large bedrooms (both with built-in robes) complemented by a period-inspired two-way bathroom. Adding to its appeal is a central study space and uniquely versatile open-plan living/dining area complete with towering cathedral ceilings accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher and gas cooktop. Other distinctive features of this light-filled home include ornate plasterwork and solid timber floors, ducted heating, split-system a/c and concealed laundry facilities, plus a sizeable rear courtyard with extensive decking. Walking distance to West Richmond Station, it also offers close proximity to a choice of tram lines (Bridge Road, Church Street and Victoria Street), cool cafes and renowned restaurants, boutique shops and major supermarkets, as well as Epworth medical precinct and the MCG.
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
If you're attending a Private Appointment, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from our team and refrain from touching any items/fixtures and doors within the property. You must wear a face mask and we will provide gloves for your appointment. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.
Insights: First listed on 28 September, this house has been on Domain for 21 days (last updated on 28 September). It was last sold in 2012 and 88 other 2 bedroom house in Richmond have recently been sold.

Description:
Timeless Terrace with Ultimate City-Edge Convenience
**Please contact us via email or phone to speak about your options to privately inspect this property. Thank you.***
***Please register your interest in this property so that we can ensure you are included in the Virtual Auction and/or contacted in the event the property is going to be sold prior to the Virtual Auction***
Retaining all the character and allure of its nineteenth century origins, this captivating Victorian provides a contemporary inner-urban sanctuary of quality and privacy thanks to its open-design interior, quality enhancements and reassuringly secure surrounds. Beyond the gorgeous facade, discover a warm and inviting interior comprising a side entrance hallway complete with towering ceilings, along with two generous bedrooms (both with built-in robes and decorative fireplaces) and updated bathroom. Bathed in northerly light, the open living/dining area is further enhanced by a tastefully-appointed kitchen featuring tiled splashbacks, integrated dishwasher and stainless steel cooking appliances. Other highlights of this period prize include split-system heating and cooling for all-seasons enjoyment, solid hardwood floors, internal laundry facilities, bi-folds (from the living area) to a secluded and a sunny courtyard with extensive paving and walkway ROW at the rear. Number 96 trams (to the CBD and St Kilda Beach) virtually at your doorstep, it's also a short stroll to the buzz of Brunswick Street, Rathdowne Village cafes and shops, as well as close proximity to the area's popular schools and the open spaces of Edinburgh Gardens.
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
If you're attending a Private Appointment, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from our team and refrain from touching any items/fixtures and doors within the property. You must wear a face mask and we will provide gloves for your appointment. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.

Description:
Central City Style with Outdoor Sanctuary and All-New Upgrades
Perfectly positioned for lifestyle, convenience and walkability, this ultra-stylish 1 bedroom apartment is exceptional value for money in the heart of the city. Simply stroll to to the financial and legal precincts, Melbourne Central, Emporium shopping, Queen Victoria Market, Chinatown, and a wide range of transport and higher educational choices. This a rare opportunity to enter the market with confidence, invest wisely, or purchase your very own affordable lock-and-leave city base. Move quickly as this one will prove popular!
Providing a real sense of occasion, a magnificently marbled foyer sets the scene from the very first step inside the building. Once inside the 10th floor apartment, discover a space-efficient layout with a free-flowing open-plan living and dining area, complemented by a chef-friendly kitchen boasting a brand-new, high-quality Belling oven and easy-clean induction cooktop plus a new fridge. Step outside and almost touch the city from your very own private balcony basking in northern light. Just as dazzling by day or night, this welcome outdoor space is a rare feature in the CBD. Enjoying a soaring variable ceiling height and a warehouse conversion feel, the robed bedroom is generous in size with a sizeable study nook and shelving, while a refreshed bathroom sparkles with a new WC and shower head fitting.
Additional features include panel heating in all rooms, sleek floating timber floorboards, all-new pendant lighting throughout, roller blinds over an openable window, lift access, and secure intercom entry. Immaculately presented and showcasing easy living in the heart of the city, do not let this opportunity pass you by!
* Photo identification will be required upon entering the property at the inspection time.
* We are open for business remotely and here to help. Please contact our agent with your personal enquiry about this home today.

Description:
Aurora Melbourne Central - A New Dawn, A New Dimension
Please contact agent for private inspection!
Brand New High ROI returns
Stamp duty savings
Final Stage 3 - settling soon.
2Beds 2Baths + 1Car +1 storage cage
Overlooking Bay-view and Botanic Garden
Basement retail shops + trains lines connections
Tiffany Yan 0435 778 656 Sales Consultant of Azeta Property Management for more information on this great investment. Book an inspection now to view the facilities of this Landmark Aurora Melbourne Central!!!
Aurora Melbourne Central is the only residential development in Melbourne with a direct underground connection to the Melbourne Central Train Station and the city's largest continuous retail precinct. In the heart of the CBD, this alluring 86 -storey tower features luxury 1,2 and 3 bedroom residences with breathtaking views over some of the citys most treasured landmarks. Enjoy unprecedented convenience and connectivity to everything, including world-leading universities like the University of Melbourne and RMIT, cultural attractions, superb shopping, entertainment and dining only an elevator ride away.
A self-contained community, catering to your every need, including Private Cinema, Karaoke Room, Gymnasium, Themed Dining and Lounge Rooms, Sauna, Steam, 25m Indoor Lap Pool, Reading Lounge, Plunge Pool / Outdoor Jacuzzi, Outdoor Dining and BBQ area, Sundeck, Yoga Zone, Dance Barre, High Tea Room, and more.
Aurora offers:
- Elegant and luxurious finishes between the lighter Dawn scheme or darker Twilight scheme
- European kitchen appliances, kitchen joinery as well as sanitary wares and fittings
- Access to natural lighting for all bedrooms
- Floor to ceiling glass with stunning views across the city to the bay, parklands, Dandenong Ranges and beyond for some units
- Beautifully designed facilities for Stratus Club, Cumulus Club, Australis Club
Dont miss the rare opportunity once in a lifetime chance to live amongst the clouds and experience a new paradigm in urban living! CALL NOW!
*AZeta Team States*
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority.

During this time, we encourage you to contact the listing agent with your details to register your interest.
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.
